attributes.action: enforce equal rights for Whites by ensuring that any body or ruling anywhere that specifies "Asian" or "Black" be declared illegal if the same body or ruling would be declared illegal were "Asian" or "Black" replaced with "White"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Black Police Officers' Association": ok
"Asian Police Officers' Association": ok
"White Police Officers' Association": racist

"Music of Black Origin": ok
"Music of Asian Origin": ok
"Music of White Origin": racist

"You must employ x% Black workers": ok
"You must employ x% Asian workers": ok
"You must employ x% White workers": racist

...you get the gist.

Equal Rights for All, please. Unpopular thought it might be, that includes White people.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "enforce equal rights for Whites by ensuring that any body or ruling anywhere that specifies "Asian" or "Black" be declared illegal if the same body or ruling would be declared illegal were "Asian" or "Black" replaced with "White"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14571.asp

Prime Minister's Office
